task: Develop a basic 'Diablo' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Just carry on'.
name: Infernal Odyssey

branding_data.short_description: Embark on an endless adventure through a dark and treacherous world filled with demons and loot in Infernal Odyssey.
branding_data.detailed_description: Infernal Odyssey is a dark fantasy action RPG where players delve into a procedurally generated underworld filled with demonic foes, hidden treasures, and endless challenges. Inspired by the classic 'Diablo' series, the game features an isometric view and intense combat mechanics. Players choose from a variety of character classes, each with unique abilities and skills, and embark on a journey through ever-changing dungeons. The oblique strategy 'Just carry on' is woven into the game's design, encouraging players to persevere through relentless waves of enemies and seemingly insurmountable odds. As players progress, they gather powerful equipment and unlock new skills to enhance their capabilities, all while uncovering the mysteries of the infernal realm.
